cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.30.2.0)
set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "C:/projects/c++/libpqxx-7.9.2/cmake")
cmake_policy(SET CMP0126 OLD)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0128 OLD)
project(CMAKE_TRY_COMPILE CXX)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE 1)
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${COMPILE_DEFINITIONS}")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "-g")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "${CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS} ${EXE_LINKER_FLAGS}")
include_directories(${INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
set(CMAKE_SUPPRESS_REGENERATION 1)
link_directories(${LINK_DIRECTORIES})
cmake_policy(SET CMP0065 NEW)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0083 OLD)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0155 OLD)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0157 OLD)
include("${CMAKE_ROOT}/Modules/Internal/HeaderpadWorkaround.cmake")
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "C:/projects/c++/libpqxx_test/build/libpqxx-build/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp")
add_executable(cmTC_e3998)
target_sources(cmTC_e3998 PRIVATE
  "C:/projects/c++/libpqxx-7.9.2/config-tests/PQXX_HAVE_CHARCONV_FLOAT.cxx"
)
file(GENERATE OUTPUT "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/cmTC_e3998_loc"
     CONTENT $<TARGET_FILE:cmTC_e3998>)
set_property(TARGET cmTC_e3998 PROPERTY "CXX_EXTENSIONS" "OFF")
set_property(TARGET cmTC_e3998 PROPERTY "CXX_STANDARD" "17")
set_property(TARGET cmTC_e3998 PROPERTY "CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED" "ON")
target_link_libraries(cmTC_e3998 ${LINK_LIBRARIES})
